meanings.definition: A thin, flat cake of batter, usually fried and turned in a pan.
meanings.sent1: Mom made a delicious pancake for breakfast.
meanings.sent2: I love adding syrup to my pancake.
meanings.sent3: The pancake jumped out of the pan and onto the floor!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as warm and comforting as a freshly made pancake.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the pancake cooking filled the kitchen with happiness.

meanings.definition: A similar cake with a filling or topping.
meanings.sent1: The bakery displayed a variety of pancake options.
meanings.sent2: I prefer a chocolate-filled pancake for dessert.
meanings.sent3: The pancake wearing a hat of whipped cream looked quite fancy.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a sprinkle of joy on top of the pancake of life.
meanings.sent5: The pancake with a cherry on top was too pretty to eat.
